document: SENTENTIAL COMPLEMENTATION IN MIDDLE ENGLISH AND EARLY MODERN ENGLISH: A STUDY OF LINGUISTIC CHANGE by Eiko Tamano Ito A dissertation submitted in partial fulfillment of the requirements for the degree of Doctor of Education (English Language & Literature) in The University of Michigan 1971 Doctoral Committee: Associate Professor Jay L.
